name: Math Attack
description:
Those pesky little biplanes are at it again, disrupting and bombing your long-standing building projects that you've worked so hard to complete.

Well, enough is enough!

Utilize your turret to blast away each and every intruder by entering in the correct answer to the corresponding math problems on their fuselage.

"Math Attack" was Tadpole Interactive's first official release, dating back to 2012.

This is a simple educational game, designed to test one's speed and proficiency with basic addition, subtraction, division, and multiplication tables.

Simply enter in the correct answer to each math problem corresponding to the labels on each target, then press the "Enter" key to fire at the designated biplane.  Naturally, hits and misses are recorded based on whether the player has managed to input the correct answer at the moment each shot is fired.

CONTROLS

numeric keys                                            answers to math problems

ENTER                                                         Fire Gun/ Select Menu Option

TAB                                                                Select alternate target

BACKSPACE                                            adjust answer

Up/Down Arrows                                cycle through menu options (Main Menu only)
